0100100110001011 0101010001101001 0 -> sum: 1001110111110100, cout: 0

1000100101100001 0110100011010010 0 -> sum: 1111001000110011, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
